list-view-config.query-select:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX core: <http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#> PREFIX duke: <http://vivo.duke.edu/vivo/ontology/duke-extension#> PREFIX vitro: <http://vitro.mannlib.cornell.edu/ns/vitro/0.7#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?industryRelationship ?company ?companyName WHERE { ?subject ?property ?industryRelationship . ?industryRelationship vitro:mostSpecificType duke:IndustryRelationship . ?industryRelationship core:relates ?company . ?company vitro:mostSpecificType duke:Company . ?company rdfs:label ?companyName . }
